name: bird cannon (samuel0l0y)
description:
PLAY IN FULL-SCREEN OR EVERYTHING WILL BE DISTORTED!

"there's not enough room for everyone in the sky."

  • move mouse to aim
  • click to shoot cannon
  • play game modes from "easy" to "hard" (with "tImE fOr To DiE!" as a bonus)
  • have fun and enjoy listening to crazy CG(computer generated) music while killing birds!

Credits: thanks to Neural Composer from This video by CodeParade for the soundtrack in the game!
